location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 433: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell forwards copies of his letters to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Persia. The letters (nos. 425, 426, 428 and 429) are not included with this letter, but they do appear as earlier items in the file (see ff.195, ff.196-197, ff.198-199 and ff.200-203 respectively).
